Testing

{% raw %} 
from datasets import Dataset
run_params = RunParams()
data_manager = DataManager(run_params)
train_ds, valid_ds = data_manager.prepare_data()
assert isinstance(train_ds, Dataset)
assert isinstance(valid_ds, Dataset)
